Key Match Events: Jason Holder took 4 wickets in 4 balls
Jason Holder became the first West Indian to take a hat-trick in T20Is
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Holder said it was a classy finish and thanked his team for the victory
Kieron Pollard thanked his team for supporting each other and credited all the boys for their effort
Moeen Ali praised West Indies' performance and mentioned they will learn from this series
Jason Holder became the first West Indian to take a hat-trick in T20Is
Miscellaneous Highlights: Akeal Hosein got rid of Jason Roy in the first over
West Indies bowled out England in the last over
